name: Pink Onion
author: Erin M.
description: I love these guys!  I came in for a quick pizza to go, which ended up taking longer than expected due to the guys overcooking the first pizza.  They made me a second pizza without bringing me the first, because they actually care about quality.  And it was worth the wait! I got the tyson punch out--fabulous sausage and super yummy.  Crust was cooked perfectly--not too crisp, not too gummy.  It was the best pizza I've had since living in NYC. The owners were both there, chatting with the customers, and making pizza.  Love the warm, fun atmosphere. And...I still made it in time for the symphony. GO HERE--you will not regret it!
